verses.english: By the sky and the night comer -
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da sama da mai aukõwa da dare.

verses.english: And what can make you know what is the night comer?
verses.hausa: To, mẽ yã sanar da kai abin da ake cẽwa mai aukõwa da dare?
Shi ne taurãron nan mai tsananin haske.

verses.arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.english: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.
verses.hausa: Bãbu wani rai fãce a kansa akwai wani mai tsaro.

verses.english: So let man observe from what he was created.
verses.hausa: To, mutum ya dũba, daga mẽ aka halittã shi?

verses.english: He was created from a fluid, ejected,
verses.hausa: An halittã shi daga wani ruwa mai tunkuɗar jũna.

verses.english: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.
verses.hausa: Yanã fita daga tsakanin tsatso da karankarman ƙirji.

verses.english: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Shi (Allah), ga mayar da shi (mutum), tabbas Mai iyãwa ne.

verses.english: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

verses.arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.english: Then man will have no power or any helper.
verses.hausa: Saboda haka, bã shi da wani ƙarfi, kuma bã shi da wani mai taimako (da zai iya kãre shi daga azãbar Allah).
Ina rantsuwa da sama ma'abũciyar ruwa mai kõmãwa yana yankẽwa.

verses.english: And [by] the earth which cracks open,
Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,
verses.hausa: Lalle ne shĩ (Alƙur'ãni), haƙĩƙa magana ce daki-daki

verses.english: Indeed, they are planning a plan,
verses.hausa: Lalle ne sũ, suna ƙulla kaidi na sõsai.

verses.english: But I am planning a plan.
verses.hausa: Kuma Ni, Ina mayar da kaidi (gare su) kamar yadda suke ƙulla kaidi.

verses.english: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.
verses.hausa: Saboda haka, ka yi wa kafirai jinkiri, ka dakata musu, sannu-sannu.
